snippet: Dr. Szasz wrote “The Myth of Mental Illness,” a book that questioned the legitimacy of his field and made enemies of many fellow doctors.
abstract: Dr Thomas Szasz, well-known psychiatrist whose controversial book The Myth of Mental Illness questioned the legitimacy of his field and provided the intellectual grounding for generations of critics, patient advocates and anti-psychiatry activists, dies at age 92.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Szasz wrote “The Myth of Mental Illness,” a book that questioned the legitimacy of his field and made enemies of many fellow doctors.

headline.seo: Dr. Thomas Szasz, Psychiatrist Who Led Movement Against His Field, Dies at 92
headline.main: Dr. Thomas Szasz, Psychiatrist Who Led Movement Against His Field, Dies at 92
headline.print_headline: Dr. Thomas Szasz, Psychiatrist Who Led Movement Against His Field, Dies at 92
